Description:
This changelog.json tries to adhere to the best practices of others. 

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/). 
As soon as the first stable release is published, this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).
Unreleased: ad separate custom UI library rng-utils

Changelog.comment: Improved UX and UI and made stored data persistent

Breaking.comment: restructured stored user data and introduced change to user store to demonstrate feature
